channel.title: Android/iOS question
channel.description: Hey guys, this is just a basic question. What program are Android and iOS games made in? I know you can use xCode for iOS but I do not have a mac. What other programs are good to use?

item.title: Android/iOS question
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

the way the market is id say look into html5 and a premium webservice for deploying it to ios or gathering a couple hundred and going to buy a mac (fairly certain a 2011 macbook pro will run yosemite/latest xcose updates could be wrong tho) and theyre pretty cheap

or use a game engine that supports mobile development.

Read full topic

item.title: Android/iOS question
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Vain_:

you can program it in any language that has a wrapper for it. tbh

Do you know if there are any programs with built in emulators that I can test the game on as I go?

Read full topic
